Skip to contents
trelliscope 0.1.0
  • Get started
  • Reference

Function reference

Panel visualization identification

Specify which column of a data frame is a reference to an image/html to be rendered

iframe_panel()
Cast a vector of URLs pointing to html pages as an image panel source
iframe_panel_local()
Cast a vector of URLs pointing to html pages as an image panel source
img_panel()
Cast a vector of URLs pointing to images as an image panel source
img_panel_local()
Cast a vector of URLs pointing to local images as an image panel source

Panel visualization creation

Utilities to create R visualizations to be used as panels

facet_panels()
Add a trelliscope facet to a ggplot
nest_panels()
Render the panels of a trelliscope display
map2_plot() pmap_plot()
Map over multiple inputs simultaneously and return a vector of plots
map_plot()
Apply a function to each element of a vector and return a vector of plots

Create a Trelliscope data frame

as_trelliscope_df()
Instantiate a trelliscope data frame

Pipe functions

These functions receive and return a modified trelliscope data frame

set_default_filters()
Add a filter state specifications to a trelliscope display
set_default_labels()
Add a labels state specification to a trelliscope display
set_default_layout()
Add a layout state specification to a trelliscope display
set_default_sort()
Add a labels state specification to a trelliscope display
add_meta_defs()
Add multiple meta variable definitions to a trelliscope display
add_meta_def()
Add a meta variable definition to a trelliscope display
add_meta_labels()
Specify labels for meta variables
add_meta_tags()
Specify tags for meta variables
add_inputs()
Add inputs to a trelliscope display
add_view()
Add a view specification to a trelliscope display
add_charm()
Use fidelius to password protect a trelliscope display
write_panels()
Write panels
write_trelliscope()
Write the contents of a display
view_trelliscope()
View a trelliscope display

Meta variables

Specify attributes of the meta variables by which the panels can be interactively explored

meta_currency()
Specify a "currency" metadata variable
meta_date()
Specify a "date" metadata variable
meta_datetime()
Specify a "datetime" metadata variable
meta_factor()
Specify a "factor" metadata variable
meta_geo()
Specify a "geo" metadata variable
meta_graph()
Specify a "graph" metadata variable
meta_href()
Specify a "href" metadata variable
meta_number()
Specify a "number" metadata variable
meta_string()
Specify a "string" metadata variable

Inputs

Specify panel-level user inputs

input_checkbox()
Specify a "checkbox" input
input_multiselect()
Specify a "multiselect" input
input_number()
Specify a "numeric" input box
input_radio()
Specify a "radio button" input
input_select()
Specify a "select" input
input_text()
Specify a "text box" input

State specification

Specify states to be used in default and custom views

filter_range()
Specify a range "filter" state (applies to numeric, date, and datetime meta variables)
filter_string()
Specify a string "filter" state (applies to string and factor meta variables)
state_labels()
Specify a "labels" state
state_layout()
Specify a "layout" state
state_sort()
Specify a "sort" state

Miscellanious utilities

show_info()
View trelliscope info of a trelliscope data frame
as_json()
Convert any trelliscope R6 object to JSON
infer_meta()
Infer meta variable definitions
update_display_list()
Update the list of all displays in an app directory
currencies
Data frame of currencies and their codes

Embedding

trelliscopeOutput() renderTrelliscope()
Shiny bindings for trelliscope
add_trelliscope_resource_path()
Add Trelliscope resource path for Shiny app

Example datasets

gapminder
Gapminder data
mars_rover
Mars rover data

Experimental

local_websocket_server()
Set up a local websocket server

On this page
